description: Developed for the humid tropical or dry desert air, the Bless Up LS is Roark’s all around, moisture wicking, mechanical stretch, perforated woven—now, with sleeves. The “Bless Up’s” Tactel fibers are lighter, softer and stronger than your everyday cotton woven providing a long lasting yet light & airy experience.
name: Roark Bless Up LS Woven - Mens
